key.name: brightness
key.description: Set the brightness factor - 100% for no reduction to 10% for very dark background windows.

key.name: saturation
key.description: Set the saturation factor - 100% for no reduction to 0% for full grayscale.

key.name: toggle-shortcut
key.description: Shortcut key to toggle the background windows dimming on or off.

key.name: dimming-enabled
key.description: Control if the dimming effect is on or off while the extension is enabled. Used with the shortcut key above.
